content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Welcome@123';
GO


CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL MyCredentials
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2022-11-14T18:55:15Z&st=2022-11-14T10:55:15Z&spr=https&sig=6EHnnk7Gd8ef3%2Fb%2FT6QDtl0iaAztAi00sOkI9DC%2FrwY%3D';


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ExternalDataSource_WithCredential] WITH
(
	TYPE = HADOOP,
	LOCATION = 'abfss://container2@koushikstorageacc.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = MyCredentials
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ExternalFileFormat_WithCredential] 
WITH (
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
	FORMAT_OPTIONS (
		FIELD_TERMINATOR = N',', 
		FIRST_ROW = 2, 
		USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False
	)
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ExternalTable_WithCredential]
( 
	[id] [int]  NULL,
	[Name] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[Age] [int]  NULL,
	[Gender] [varchar](6)  NULL
)
WITH ( DATA_SOURCE = [ExternalDataSource_WithCredential], 
LOCATION = N'informationUpdated.csv', 
FILE_FORMAT = [ExternalFileFormat_WithCredential], REJECT_TYPE = VALUE, REJECT_VALUE = 0 )
GO

select * from ExternalTable_WithCredential
